#summary Installing

= Introduction =

First install Mediawiki.

The TB Transcription Desl comprises two Mediawiki extensions: JBTEIToolbar (supporting TEI markup) and JBZV (the Zoom Viewer support).

Download each directory(JBTEIToolbar and JBZV).
